ygData.subject: Re: studded
ygData.msgSnippet: sorry, you make scalers but u can sharpen weapons also at that skill level scalers molds are found at the cottage in the hills and in most places that sell
ygData.messageBody:
sorry, you make scalers but u can sharpen weapons also at that skill level
scalers molds are found at the cottage in the hills and in most places that
sell molds i assume. They combine to form large lid cntainer molds.

At 09:27 AM 5/2/99 EDT, you wrote:
>From: DrgSlayr@...
>
>What is a scaler? and where do I find them to sharpen them?
>
>
>
>Thank you for your time
>Ron

> here is how i got to skill 80.

> train to 20
> sharpen
> scalers to 41
> skewers to 70
> gorgets and bracers to 80
> masks belts helms 1/4 at 80 skill
> >>
